content: Anna Vallgårda - IT-University of Copenhagen Anna Vallgårda public CV Anna Vallgårda Head of Section Professor, Human-Computer Interaction and DesignIxD Lab https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9898-8106 Emailakavitudk 20042024 Research activity per year Personal profile Research areasIn my research, I seek to answer the question of how we can design alternative possible futures with stronger ethical and ecological commitments. This drives my research in three areas: developing critical practices for interaction design, designing new ethically responsible care technologies for a diverse population, and exploring the relationship between aesthetics and attunement. I do this through an exploratory design practice where I design artifacts that push the boundaries of what we can and should expect from the technologies we live with. I work with design as an inherently critical practice where artifacts in them selves question our current practice.
